name: Nebula Online - (Game + OST)
detailed_description:
This DLC contains Nebula Online and soundtrack.

It contains 5 tracks:

01 - Nebula OST - Main Theme
02 - Nebula OST - Humans Theme
03 - Nebula OST - Kriptizids Theme
04 - Nebula OST - Borguzands Theme
05 - Nebula OST - Borguzands Second Theme
about_the_game:
This DLC contains Nebula Online and soundtrack.

It contains 5 tracks:

01 - Nebula OST - Main Theme
02 - Nebula OST - Humans Theme
03 - Nebula OST - Kriptizids Theme
04 - Nebula OST - Borguzands Theme
05 - Nebula OST - Borguzands Second Theme

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz, AMD Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 256 MB VRAM or more that supports Shader Model 3 and DirectX 9.0c (AMD Radeon 2600 XT or NVIDIA GeForce 8600 GTS)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium i5 Series or AMD X4 @ 2.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 6790 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 or better with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: CPU that supports SSE2 (Intel Dual Core @ 2.0 GHz)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with 256 MB VRAM or more that supports Shader Model 3 and DirectX 9.0c (NVIDIA GeForce 320m, Intel HD 3000)
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Series @ 3.0 GHz or greater
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 675mx or better with at least 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2,4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/Nvidia
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/Nvidia
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Supports SSE, Direct Sound compatible
